title: Power - average power by a constant force

content.question: A constant force delivers an average power of <math alttext="10 watts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math> to a box. The average speed of the box is <math alttext="2 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> and the force is exerted in the direction of motion of the box. What is the magnitude of the force?

choices.label: <math alttext="20 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>
<math alttext="12 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>
<math alttext="10 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>
<math alttext="5 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="5 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
